casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joshua J. GENTRY. No. 584P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of October 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review Pursuant to N.C.G.S. 7A-31(B)(1)(2)(3)(4), (C)(1)(2)(3):"

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
